dialog: I could take a sabbatical from Hogwarts, or we could journey to Hogsmeade for the weekend, either way.
We could convene at the wizarding real estate agency, or I could collect you from your wizarding abode.
I am departing from Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, so perhaps I could merely meet you at the first domicile we shall inspect.
I can think of five wizarding homes that we ought to survey. It will occupy most of the day.
I would like to see as many as possible, if it please you.
When I have received confirmation from the owners, I shall send an owl with our itinerary for the day.
Do you offer a wizarding tour to Hollywood?
Indeed, here is the schedule. Which plan suits your fancy best?
The seven-day sojourn shall suffice. Pray, how much does this tour cost?
Three hundred galleons.
We shall take the journey. Could you provide us with a brochure?
Of course, here you are.
What is the matter? Matters are becoming disordered. You persist in intermeddling where you are not wanted.
What do you imply?

Presently, I am tasked with instructing new students, but you persist in interfering with my authority by advocating your methods. I am aware that you are a talented wizard with much to prove, but I do not approve of your manner.
Mother, upon your return to our wizarding abode, kindly purchase a cloak, a robe, and a sweater...
Enough is enough, I comprehend.
Mr. Chen, would you object if I were to smoke a wizarding cigarette?
I apologize, Mrs. Lin. We do not allow smoking within the wizarding office.
Good morning, may I assist you?
